Title: Establishes the interstate insurance product regulation compact to regulate certain insurance products among member states
Summary: Establishes the "Interstate insurance product regulation compact" to regulate certain insurance products among member states and to promote and protect the interest of consumers of individual and group annuity, life insurance, disability income and long-term care insurance products.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to establishing the interstate insurance product regulation compact to regulate certain insurance products
